20110111030205.000|20110111030209.000|CC1|MARK KELLY IN NOVEMBER 2007 IN

20110111030214.000|20110111030215.000|CC1|PRACTICED WHAT SHE PREACHED,

20110111030537.000|20110111030539.000|CC1|-- STALKER REPORTEDLY PLANNING A
20110111030539.000|20110111030541.000|CC1|TRIP TO ALASKA, WAS INSISTING   
20110111030541.000|20110111030544.000|CC1|THE MAP WAS NOT DESIGNED TO

20110111030545.000|20110111030546.000|CC1|SHE WASN'T AFRAID, BUT THE

20110111030548.000|20110111030549.000|CC1|>> THERE'S CONSEQUENCES TO THAT 
20110111030549.000|20110111030551.000|CC1|ACTION.                         
20110111030551.000|20110111030552.000|CC1|>> ONE OF THE BIG QUESTIONS

20110111030557.000|20110111030558.000|CC1|OUR TEAM OF "EXTRA" LIFE        
20110111030558.000|20110111030559.000|CC1|CHANGERS IS BREAKING DOWN HER   
20110111030559.000|20110111030601.000|CC1|RECOVERY.                       
20110111030601.000|20110111030603.000|CC1|A SQUEEZE OF THE HAND.          
20110111030603.000|20110111030605.000|CC1|MOVING TWO FINGERS.             
20110111030605.000|20110111030606.000|CC1|MOVEMENTS THAT DON'T SOUND LIKE 
20110111030606.000|20110111030607.000|CC1|MUCH.                           
20110111030607.000|20110111030608.000|CC1|BUT FOR GABRIELLE GIFFORDS, THEY
20110111030608.000|20110111030610.000|CC1|MEAN EVERYTHING.                
20110111030610.000|20110111030613.000|CC1|"EXTRA" LIFE CHANGER AND CHIEF  
20110111030613.000|20110111030615.000|CC1|OF NEUROSURGERY AT THE UCLA     
20110111030615.000|20110111030617.000|CC1|MEDICAL CENTER DR. NEIL MARTIN  
20110111030617.000|20110111030619.000|CC1|SAYS IF SURVIVING THE BULLET WAS
20110111030619.000|20110111030620.000|CC1|ONE MIRACLE, THE STEPS TO       
20110111030620.000|20110111030621.000|CC1|RECOVERY WILL REQUIRE MANY MORE.
20110111030621.000|20110111030623.000|CC1|>> RIGHT NOW SHE'S IN A         
20110111030623.000|20110111030625.000|CC1|MEDICALLY INDUCED COMA TO       
20110111030625.000|20110111030627.000|CC1|PROTECT THE BRAIN WHILE IT      
20110111030627.000|20110111030629.000|CC1|STABILIZES AND THE HEALING      
20110111030629.000|20110111030630.000|CC1|PROCESS BEGINS.                 
20110111030630.000|20110111030631.000|CC1|THAT'S GOING TO TAKE FIVE DAYS  
20110111030631.000|20110111030632.000|CC1|OR A WEEK.                      
20110111030632.000|20110111030633.000|CC1|>> NEXT STEP, ASSESS THE DAMAGE 
20110111030633.000|20110111030635.000|CC1|WHEN THE SWELLING ON THE BRAIN  
20110111030635.000|20110111030636.000|CC1|GOES DOWN.                      
20110111030636.000|20110111030637.000|CC1|THAT COULD BE SEVERAL MORE WEEKS
20110111030637.000|20110111030638.000|CC1|OR EVEN MONTHS.                 
20110111030638.000|20110111030640.000|CC1|>> THE BULLET ENTERED IN THE    
20110111030640.000|20110111030642.000|CC1|BACK OF THE HEAD AND CAME OUT IN
20110111030642.000|20110111030644.000|CC1|THE FRONT.                      
20110111030644.000|20110111030645.000|CC1|THE LEFT SIDE OF THE BRAIN IN   
20110111030645.000|20110111030647.000|CC1|MOST PEOPLE IS THE HOME FOR     
20110111030647.000|20110111030649.000|CC1|ELOQUENT FUNCTIONS LIKE READING,
20110111030649.000|20110111030650.000|CC1|WRITING, COMPREHENSION, AND     
20110111030650.000|20110111030651.000|CC1|SPEECH.                         
20110111030651.000|20110111030653.000|CC1|>> THERE ARE GOOD SIGNS ALREADY,
20110111030653.000|20110111030655.000|CC1|MOVING HER FINGERS AND          
20110111030655.000|20110111030656.000|CC1|RESPONDING TO VOCAL INSTRUCTION.
20110111030656.000|20110111030658.000|CC1|>> HER LANGUAGE FUNCTION, AND   
20110111030658.000|20110111030701.000|CC1|THIS IS CRITICAL, IS WORKING,   
20110111030701.000|20110111030703.000|CC1|FULL LANGUAGE FUNCTION, MEMORY, 
20110111030703.000|20110111030704.000|CC1|INTELLECTUAL PUCKS.             
20110111030704.000|20110111030708.000|CC1|THOSE HAVE TO WAIT UNTIL SHE'S  
20110111030708.000|20110111030709.000|CC1|FULLY AWAKE.                    
20110111030709.000|20110111030710.000|CC1|>> THOSE WILL OCCUR IN THREE TO 
20110111030710.000|20110111030711.000|CC1|SIX MONTHS.                     
20110111030711.000|20110111030712.000|CC1|AND AMAZINGLY, HER BRAIN IS     
20110111030712.000|20110111030713.000|CC1|ALREADY IN THE PROCESS OF       
20110111030713.000|20110111030714.000|CC1|HEALING ITSELF.                 
20110111030714.000|20110111030717.000|CC1|>> CONTRARY TO WHAT WE USED TO  
20110111030717.000|20110111030717.000|CC1|THINK, IT IS POSSIBLE FOR THE   
20110111030717.000|20110111030720.000|CC1|BRAIN ITSELF TO REPLACE SOME    
20110111030720.000|20110111030721.000|CC1|DAMAGED BRAIN CELLS.            
20110111030721.000|20110111030724.000|CC1|>> SO THE PROGNOSIS, INCREDIBLY,
20110111030724.000|20110111030726.000|CC1|PRETTY GOOD.
